/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtMnuLoutCombDDao.selectPtMnuLoutCombD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = M.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.MNU_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_RESC_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.COMP_ID, T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID, T.MNU_LOUT_ID, T.LOUT_CAT_ID, T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_PID, T.FLD_YN, T.FLD_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.MNU_ID, T.MNU_RESC_ID, T.SORT_ORDR,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.MNU_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_RESC_NM,
FROM PT_MNU_LOUT_COMB_D T
AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID = #{mnuLoutCombId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.MNU_LOUT_ID = #{mnuLoutId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.COMP_ID, T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
